info.description:
##TMF API Reference: TMF 678 - Customer bill Management

##Release: pre-release 17.5

The Customer Bill Management API allows to find and retrieve one or several customer bills (also called invoices) produced for a customer. A customer bill is an electronic or paper document produced at the end of the billing process. The customer bill gathers and displays different items (applied customer billing rates generated during the rating and billing processes) to be charged to a customer. It represents a total amount due for all the products during the billing period and all significant information like dates, bill reference...
This API provides also operations to find and retrieve the details of applied customer billing rates presented on a customer bill. 
Finally, this API allows to request in real-time a customer bill creation and to manage this request.

### Resources 
- **customerBill** :  an electronic or paper document produced at the end of the billing process that  gathers and displays different items (applied customer billing rates generated during the rating and billing processes) to be charged to a customer.
- **appliedCustomerBillingRate** : applied billing rates created before or during the billing process and displayed on a customer bill.
- **customerBillOnDemand** : used to manage the creation request of a customer bill in real-time (on demand).

###Customer Bill Management API performs the following operations :
- Retrieve a customer bill or a collection of customer bills depending on filter criteria.
- Partial update of  a customer bill (for administration purposes).
-  Retrieve an applied customer billing rate or a collection of applied customerbilling rates depending on filter criteria.
-  Create a customer bill on demand request, retrieve one or a collection of  customer bill on demand request(s) depending on filter criteria.

- Manage notification of events on customer bill and customer bill on demand.

CustomerBill.description:
The billing account receives all charges (recurring, one time and usage) of the offers and products assigned to it during order process. Periodically according to billing cycle specifications attached to the billing account or as a result of an event, a customer bill (aka invoice) is produced. This customer bill concerns different related parties which play a role on it : for example, a customer bill is produced by an operator, is sent to a bill receiver and has to be paid by a payer.
A payment method could be assigned to the customer bill to build the call of payment. Lettering process enables to assign automatically or manually incoming amount from payments to customer bills (payment items).
A tax item is created for each tax rate used in the customer bill.
The financial account represents a financial entity which records all customerâs accounting events : payment amount are recorded as credit and invoices amount are recorded as debit. It gives the customer overall balance (account balance).
The customer bill is linked to one or more documents that can be downloaded via a provided url.

billNo.description: Bill reference known by the customer or the party and displayed on the bill. Could be different from the id

runType.description: onCycle (a bill can be created as a result of a cycle run) or offCycle (a bill can be created as a result of other events such as customer request or account close)

category.description: Category of the bill produced : normal, duplicate, interim, last, trial customer or credit note for example

nextBillDate.description: ). Approximate date of  the next bill production given for information (only used for onCycle bill)

billingPeriod.description: Billing period of the bill (used for onCycle bill only)

amountDue.description: Amount due for this bill expressed in the given currency

paymentDueDate.description: Date at which the amount due should have been paid

remainingAmount.description: Remaining amount to be paid for this bill expressed in the given currency

taxExcludedAmount.description: Total tax excluded amount expressed in the given currency

taxIncludedAmount.description: Total tax included amount expressed in the given

taxItem.description: A list of  tax items created for each tax rate and tax type used in the bill. The tax item summarize the total of the various tax types.

paymentMethod.description: A payment method reference. A payment method defines a specific mean of payment (e.g direct debit) used to build the call of payment

relatedParty.description: A list of related party references. A related party defines party or party role linked to the bill

financialAccount.description: A financial account reference. An account of money owed by a party to another entity in exchange for goods or services that have been delivered or used. An account receivable aggregates the amounts of one or more billing accounts owned by a given party.

TimePeriod.description: A business entity used to represent a period between a start and an end date and time

startDateTime.description: Start date and time of the period

endDateTime.description: End date and time of the period

Money.description: A base / value business entity used to represent money

unit.description: Currency code (ISO4217 norm uses 3 letters to define the currency).

Attachment.description: Attachment refers to extensions or additional parts that is or may be attached to something (agreements, contracts, appointments) to perform a particular function. They can be communication attachments, documents and other.

size.description: The size  in Bytes of the document or attachment

taxAmount.description: Amount of tax expressed in the given currency

href.description: Reference of the customer applied billing rate

type.description: Type of the applied billing rate : appliedBillingCharge (any kind of charge except taxation charges : recurringCharge, oneTimeCharge, usageCharge),  appliedBillingCredit (any kind of credit : rebate or productAlteration) or appliedPenaltyCharge (penalty charges such as late fees, payment rejection fees,...)

date.description: Creation date of the applied billing rate

name.description: Name of the customer applied billing rate

description.description: Additional data to be displayed on the bill for this customer applied billing rate

taxExcludedAmount.description: Tax excluded amount to be charged on the bill (expressed in the given currency) for this applied billing rate

taxIncludedAmount.description: Tax included amount to be charged on the bill (expressed in the given currency) for this applied billing rate

bill.description: Reference of the bill on which the applied billing rate  is presented

characteristic.description: A list of applied billing rate characteristics. An applied billing rate has dynamic characteristics according to the its type (characteristics are based on the service type, line of business or on others parameters for example)

AppliedBillingTaxRate.description: The applied billing tax rate represents taxes applied billing rate it refers to. It is calculated during the billing process.

taxAmount.description: Tax amount expressed in the given currency
